thread.title: Cam Neely: 'Unfair' to say Claude Julien is on 'hot seat' | Bruins Insider |
thread.title_full: Cam Neely: 'Unfair' to say Claude Julien is on 'hot seat' | Bruins Insider | | Boston Herald

author: Steve Conroy
title: Cam Neely: 'Unfair' to say Claude Julien is on 'hot seat' | Bruins Insider |
text:
If Claude Julien is on the hot seat as the Bruins enter their new season next week, Cam Neely isn’t the one heating it up.
The Bruins team president said today it’s “unfair” to speculate about the coach’s job security.
"Claude is a very good coach in the league. I think its unfair to say that he's on the hot seat,” Neely said during a press conference during the team’s annual preseason media day.
Julien, on the same dais with Neely, CEO Charlie Jacobs, owner Jeremy Jacobs and GM Don Sweeney, had said he doesn’t feel any pressure moments before Neely spoke.
Julien is entering his ninth season as Bruins coach. The team missed the playoffs for the first time in his tenure last season, after which it fired GM Peter Chiarelli.
